meta.title: Privacy Policy - PanPlans
meta.description: Learn how PanPlans collects, uses, and protects your personal data.

title: Privacy Policy
intro: At PanPlans, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Account information (email address, name)
Profile information (dietary preferences, allergies, household size)
Pantry and ingredient data you enter
Meal plans and recipes you create or save
Shopping list data

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Personalize your meal planning experience
Generate recipe and meal suggestions
Send you technical notices and support messages
Respond to your comments and questions

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use the following third-party services to operate our app:

clerk.name: Clerk
clerk.description: For authentication and user account management

supabase.name: Supabase
supabase.description: For secure data storage and real-time synchronization

thirdParty.note: These services have their own privacy policies governing their use of your data.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With your consent
To comply with legal obligations
To protect our rights and prevent fraud
With service providers who assist in our operations

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

gdpr.title: For EU/EEA Users (GDPR)
items: Right to access your personal data
Right to rectification of inaccurate data
Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
Right to restrict processing
Right to data portability
Right to object to processing

ccpa.title: For California Residents (CCPA/CPRA)
items: Right to know what personal information is collected
Right to delete personal information
Right to opt-out of sale of personal information
Right to non-discrimination for exercising your rights

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our app is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
